eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray} \vert N \rangle_{\bf X} &=&% N({\bf x}, \overline{\bf x})
\exp
\left( - \sum_{i=1}^{25}\sum_{n=1}^\infty {1 \over n}
\alpha^i_{-n} \overline{\alpha}^i_{-n} \right) \vert 0 \rangle,
\label{Neumann} \\ \vert {\rm ghost} \rangle &=& %N(b,c)
\exp
\left( - \sum_{n=1}^\infty (\overline{b}_{-n} c_{-n} + b_{-n}
\overline{c}_{-n} ) \right) (c_0 + \overline{c}_0) c_1
\overline{c}_1 \vert 0 \rangle, \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} J^\pm = \oint {\d z \over 2 \pi i} e^{\pm 2i X_R(z)}, \qquad
J^3 = \oint {\d z \over 2 \pi i} i \partial_z X_R (z). \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} \vert j, j \rangle = e^{ 2i j X (0) } \vert 0 \rangle \qquad
{\rm and} \qquad \vert j, m \rangle = N_{j,m} [J^-]^{(j-m)} \vert
j, j \rangle, \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} D^j_{\pm j, \mp j}(R) &=& \left( i \sin (\pi
\widetilde{\lambda}) \right)^{2j} \qquad \quad (j=0, \, 1/2, \, 1,
\cdots) \nn D^1_{0\,,\,0}(R) &=& \cos (2 \pi \widetilde{\lambda})
\nn D^{3\over2}_{\pm{1 \over 2}, \mp{1 \over 2}} (R) &=& i
\sin(\pi \widetilde{\lambda}) \left( 3 \cos^2(\pi
\widetilde{\lambda}) - 1 \right) \nn D^2_{\pm 1, \mp 1}(R) &=& -
\sin^2(\pi\widetilde{\lambda}) \cos(2 \pi \widetilde{\lambda})
\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} \left|\, B\,\right\rangle_{X^0} &=& f(\widehat x^0) \left|\, 0\,\right\rangle\nn
&+& g(\widehat x^0)\,\alpha^0_{-1}\overline\alpha^0_{-1}\left|\, 0\,\right\rangle\nn
&+& h_1(\widehat x^0)\,\alpha^0_{-2}\overline\alpha^0_{-2}\left|\, 0\,\right\rangle\nn
&+& h_2(\widehat x^0)\,(\alpha^0_{-1})^2(\overline\alpha^0_{-1})^2\left|\, 0\,\right\rangle\nn
&+& h_3(\widehat x^0)\,\l((\alpha^0_{-1})^2\overline\alpha^0_{-2}+
\alpha^0_{-2}(\overline\alpha^0_{-1})^2\r)\left|\, 0\,\right\rangle\nn &+& \cdots.
\label{expansion} \

\begin{eqnarray} g(x^0) &=& 1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda} \pi) - f(x^0)
\label{g} \\
h_1(x^0) &=& {1 \over 2} \left(1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda}
\pi) \right) - \sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \cosh (x^0) - {1 \over 2} f(x^0) \nn
h_2(x^0) &=& 2 \sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \cosh (x^0) + {1 \over 2} f(x^0) \nn
h_3(x^0) &=& -i \sqrt{2} \sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi) \sinh (x^0). \label{h} \

\begin{eqnarray} {\rm T-dual} \quad : \quad \left( \begin{array}{c} X^0_{\rm L} \\
X^1_{\rm L} \end{array} \right) &\rightarrow& \left(
\begin{array}{cc} +1 & 0 \\ 0 & +1 \end{array} \right) \left(
\begin{array}{c} X^0_{\rm L} \\ X^1_{\rm L} \end{array} \right)
\nn
\left( \begin{array}{c} \overline{X}^0_{\rm R} \\
\overline{X}^1_{\rm R} \end{array} \right) &\rightarrow& \left(
\begin{array}{cc} +1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right) \left(
\begin{array}{c} \overline{X}^0_{\rm R} \\ \overline{X}^1_{\rm R}
\end{array} \right). \label{tdual1} \

\begin{eqnarray} {\rm T-dual} \quad : \quad \left( \begin{array}{c} Y^0_{\rm L} \\
Y^1_{\rm L} \end{array} \right) &\rightarrow& \left(
\begin{array}{cc} +1 & 0 \\ 0 & +1 \end{array} \right) \left(
\begin{array}{c} Y^0_{\rm L} \\ Y^1_{\rm L} \end{array} \right)
\nn
\left( \begin{array}{c} \overline{Y}^0_{\rm R} \\
\overline{Y}^1_{\rm R} \end{array} \right) &\rightarrow& \left(
\begin{array}{cc} +1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right) \left(
\begin{array}{c} \overline{Y}^0_{\rm R} \\ \overline{Y}^1_{\rm R}
\end{array} \right). \label{tdual2} \

\begin{eqnarray} \gamma^{-1} \delta (\widehat{y}^1 + e \widehat{y}^0) \vert 0
\rangle = \gamma^{-1} \sum_{n \in \bf Z} e^{i {n \over R'}
(\hat{y}^1 + e \hat{y}^0)} \vert 0 \rangle \,\,\,
\rightarrow \,\,\, \gamma^{-1} \sum_{m \in \bf Z} e^{i m
(\hat{y}^1_{\rm L} - \hat{y}^1_{\rm R} + e \hat{y}^0)
R'} \vert 0 \rangle, \label{dual}\

\begin{eqnarray} \vert{\rm D25} \rangle_{T, e}^{\rm matter} &=& F^e (\widehat y^0)
\vert 0 \rangle + G^e_{ab}(\widehat y^0) \, \beta^a_{-1}
\overline{\beta}^b_{-1} \vert 0 \rangle \nn &+& H^e_{ab}(\widehat y^0)
\, \beta^a_{-2} \overline{\beta}^b_{-2} \vert 0 \rangle +
I^e_{abcd}(\widehat y^0) \, \beta_{-1}^a \beta_{-1}^b
\overline{\beta}_{-1}^c \overline{\beta}_{-1}^d \vert 0 \rangle +
\cdots \nonumber\

\begin{eqnarray} F^e (y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} \, F(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nn G^e_{ab}
(y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left({}^t \Lambda^{-1} G(\gamma^{-1} y^0)
\Lambda \right)_{ab} \nn H^e_{ab}(y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t
\Lambda^{-1} H(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \Lambda \right)_{ab} \nn
I^e_{abcd} (y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} \left(
{}^t\Lambda^{-1} I (\gamma^{-1} y^0) \Lambda \right)_{ac} \Lambda
\right)_{bd}, \

\begin{eqnarray}
\vert {\rm D25} \rangle_T^{\rm matter}
&=& \vert B \rangle_{X^1} \otimes
\vert N \rangle_{X^2} \otimes_{i \ne 1,2} \vert N \rangle_{X^i}\nn
&=& F(\widehat x^1)
 \vert 0\rangle
+ G_{ab}(\widehat x^1) \, \alpha^a_{-1} \overline{\alpha}^b_{-1} \vert
0 \rangle \nn &+& H_{ab}(\widehat x^1) \, \alpha_{-2}^a
\overline{\alpha}_{-2}^b \vert 0 \rangle + I_{abcd}(\widehat x^1) \,
\alpha_{-1}^a \alpha_{-1}^b \overline{\alpha}_{-1}^c
\overline{\alpha}_{-1}^d \vert 0 \rangle + \cdots .
\label{tachyonmodulation} \

\begin{eqnarray} \vert {\rm D25} \rangle_{T, b}^{\rm matter}
 &=& F^b (\widehat y^1)
 \vert 0\rangle
 + G^b_{ab} (\widehat y^1) \beta^a_{-1} \overline\beta^b_{-1} \vert
0 \rangle \nn &+& H^b_{ab} (\widehat y^1) \beta^a_{-2}
\overline\beta^b_{-2} \vert 0 \rangle + I_{abcd}^b(\widehat y^1) \,
\beta^a_{-1} \beta^b_{-1} \overline{\beta}_{-1}^c
\overline{\beta}_{-1}^d \vert 0 \rangle + \cdots, \

\begin{eqnarray} F^b(y^1) &=& \widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} F
(\widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} y^1) \nn G^b_{ab}(y^1) &=&
\widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} \left({}^t \Omega^{-1} G
(\widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} y^1) \Omega \right)_{ab} \nn H^b_{ab}
(y^1) &=& \widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} \left( {}^t \Omega^{-1} H
(\widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} y^1) \Omega \right)_{ab} \nn
I^b_{abcd}(y^1) &=& \widetilde{\gamma}^{-1} \left( {}^t
\Omega^{-1} \left( {}^t \Omega^{-1} I (\widetilde\gamma^{-1} y^1)
\Omega\right)_{bc} \Omega\right)_{ad} \

\begin{eqnarray}
\left|\, \Phi\,\right\rangle=\l\{ T(\widehat x)+h_{(ab)}(\widehat x)
\alpha_{-1}^a\overline\alpha_{-1}^b +B_{[ab]}(\widehat x)
\alpha_{-1}^a\overline\alpha_{-1}^b+ \phi_s(\widehat x)
(\bar c_{-1}b_{-1}+c_{-1}\overline b_{-1}) \r\}c_1\overline c_1\left|\, 0\,\right\rangle+\cdots\nn
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left|\, B\,\right\rangle_{Y^0}&=&
 f(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \vert 0 \rangle
\nn
&+&
 g(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^2
\left[ ( \beta^0_{-1} - e \beta^1_{-1} ) (\overline{\beta}^0_{-1}
+ e \overline{\beta}^1_{-1}) \right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& h_1(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^2 \left[ (\beta^0_{-2} - e
\beta^1_{-2})(\overline{\beta}^0_{-2} + e \overline{\beta}^1_{-2})
\right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+&
h_2(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^4 \left[ (\beta^0_{-1} - e
\beta^1_{-1})^2 (\overline{\beta}^0_{-1} + e
\overline{\beta}^1_{-1} )^2 \right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& h_3 (\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^3
\left[ (\beta^0_{-1} - e \beta^1_{-1} )^2 (\overline{\beta}^0_{-2}
+ e \overline{\beta}^1_{-2} ) + (\beta^0_{-2} - e \beta^1_{-2}
)(\overline{\beta}^0_{-1} + e \overline{\beta}^1_{-1})^2 \right]
\vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& \cdots, \label{timepart}
\

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nn
 &=& \gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} G^e_{00}(y^0) &=& \gamma \, g(\gamma^{-1} y^0) + \gamma e^2 \,
f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nn &=& \gamma (1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda}
\pi) ) - \gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0),\nn G^e_{11}(y^0) &=&
- e^2 \gamma  \, g(\gamma^{-1} y^0) - \gamma f(\gamma^{-1} y^0)
\nn &=& - e^2 \gamma (1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda} \pi) ) -
\gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0),\nn G^e_{ii}(y^0) &=& -
\gamma^{-1} f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad (i=2,
\cdots, 25),\nn G^e_{01}(y^0)&=&-G^e_{10}(y^0)=e\gamma
(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)). \label{Gmat} \

\begin{eqnarray}
G^{e+b}_{00}(y^0)&=&+\gamma\widetilde\gamma(1+b^2)(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi))) -{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde\gamma} f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn
G^{e+b}_{11}(y^0)&=&+\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l(\frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2}\r) (1
+ \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) -{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}
\l(\frac{1-b^2}{1+b^2}\r)f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn
G^{e+b}_{22}(y^0)&=&-\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2}{1+b^2} \r) (1
+ \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) -{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}\left( \frac{1-b^2}{1+b^2}
\right) f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn G^{e+b}_{ii}(y^0)&=&-{1 \over
\gamma\widetilde\gamma}f(\gamma^{-1}y^0) \qquad \quad
(i=3,\cdots,25),\nn
G^{e+b}_{01}(y^0)&=&+G^{e+b}_{10}(y^0)=\gamma\widetilde\gamma
eb\,(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)),\nn
G^{e+b}_{02}(y^0)&=&-G^{e+b}_{20}(y^0)=\gamma\widetilde\gamma
e\,(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)),\nn G^{e+b}_{12}(y^0)&=&-G^{e+b}_{21}(y^0)=
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2b}{1+b^2} \r) (1 + \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) +{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde\gamma} \l( \frac{2b}{1+b^2} \r) f(\gamma^{-1}y^0).
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T^{e+b}_{00}(y^0)&=&+{\cal T}_{25} \gamma\widetilde\gamma
(1+b^2) \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi),\nn
T^{e+b}_{11}(y^0)&=&+{\cal T}_{25}\l(
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2} \r)
\cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi)
-{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma} \l( \frac{1}{1+b^2} \r)
f(\gamma^{-1}y^0)\r),\nn
T^{e+b}_{22}(y^0)&=&-{\cal T}_{25}\l(
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2}{1+b^2}\r)
\cos^2(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi)
+{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}\l( \frac{1}{1+b^2}\r)
f(\gamma^{-1}y^0) \r),\nn T^{e+b}_{ii}(y^0)&=&-{\cal T}_{25}{1 \over
\gamma\widetilde\gamma}f(\gamma^{-1}y^0), \qquad \qquad
(i=3,4,\dots,25),\nn
T^{e+b}_{01}(y^0)&=&T^{e+b}_{10}(y^0)={{\cal T}_{25}} \gamma\widetilde\gamma
eb\, \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi). \label{Teb}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\partial{\cal L}}{\partial b}=-{\cal T}_p\l( \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} \left(
\frac{e^2 b}{1+b^2}\right) V(T) {\cal D}(z) +{1 \over \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma}} \left(\frac{b}{1+b^2}\right) V(T){\cal F}(z)\r).
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta\sqrt{-\det(g+F)} &=&\sqrt{-\det(\eta+F)} \l({1 \over
\eta+F}\r)^{(ab)}\delta g_{ab}\nn &=&\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l(
{-(1+b^2)\delta g_{00} + be(\delta g_{01}+\delta g_{10})
+(1-e^2)\delta g_{11}+\delta g_{22} }\r) \nn
&+&\frac{1}{\gamma\widetilde\gamma} \sum_{i\ge3}\delta g_{ii}, \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta z&=&-\l(\frac{1}{\eta+F}\,\delta
g\,\frac{1}{\eta+F}\r)^{(ab)} \partial_a T\partial_b T\nn &=& -\gamma^4
\widetilde{\gamma}^4 \l[ {(1+b^2)\delta g_{00}-be(1+b^2)(\delta
g_{01}+\delta g_{10}) +b^2 e^2 \delta g_{11}-e^2 \delta g_{22}}\r]
\dot T^2. \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{00}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} (1+b^2) \,V(T){\cal D}(z),\nn
\frac{\delta{\cal L}}{\delta g_{11}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2}\l( +\gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} \frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal D}(z) -{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}} \frac{1}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal F}(z)\r),\nn
\frac{\delta{\cal L}}{\delta g_{22}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} \l( -\gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} \frac{e^2}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal D}(z) -{1 \over \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma}} \frac{1}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal F}(z)\r),\nn
\frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{ii}}&=&-\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} {1 \over
\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}} \,V(T){\cal F}(z), \qquad \qquad (i = 3,
\cdots, p),\nn \frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{01}}&=&\frac{\delta
{\cal L}}{\delta g_{10}} =-\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2}\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}
\,eb\,V(T){\cal D}(z). \nonumber
\

 f(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \vert 0 \rangle
\nn
&+&
 g(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^2
\left[ ( \beta^0_{-1} - e \beta^1_{-1} ) (\overline{\beta}^0_{-1}
+ e \overline{\beta}^1_{-1}) \right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& h_1(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^2 \left[ (\beta^0_{-2} - e
\beta^1_{-2})(\overline{\beta}^0_{-2} + e \overline{\beta}^1_{-2})
\right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+&
h_2(\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^4 \left[ (\beta^0_{-1} - e
\beta^1_{-1})^2 (\overline{\beta}^0_{-1} + e
\overline{\beta}^1_{-1} )^2 \right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& h_3 (\gamma^{-1}\widehat y^0) \gamma^3
\left[ (\beta^0_{-1} - e \beta^1_{-1} )^2 (\overline{\beta}^0_{-2}
+ e \overline{\beta}^1_{-2} ) + (\beta^0_{-2} - e \beta^1_{-2}
)(\overline{\beta}^0_{-1} + e \overline{\beta}^1_{-1})^2 \right]
\vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& \cdots, \label{timepart}
\

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0) &=& \gamma^{-1} f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nn
 &=& \gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} G^e_{00}(y^0) &=& \gamma \, g(\gamma^{-1} y^0) + \gamma e^2 \,
f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \nn &=& \gamma (1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda}
\pi) ) - \gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0),\nn G^e_{11}(y^0) &=&
- e^2 \gamma  \, g(\gamma^{-1} y^0) - \gamma f(\gamma^{-1} y^0)
\nn &=& - e^2 \gamma (1 + \cos (2 \widetilde{\lambda} \pi) ) -
\gamma (1 - e^2) f(\gamma^{-1} y^0),\nn G^e_{ii}(y^0) &=& -
\gamma^{-1} f(\gamma^{-1} y^0) \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad (i=2,
\cdots, 25),\nn G^e_{01}(y^0)&=&-G^e_{10}(y^0)=e\gamma
(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)). \label{Gmat} \

\begin{eqnarray}
G^{e+b}_{00}(y^0)&=&+\gamma\widetilde\gamma(1+b^2)(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi))) -{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde\gamma} f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn
G^{e+b}_{11}(y^0)&=&+\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l(\frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2}\r) (1
+ \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) -{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}
\l(\frac{1-b^2}{1+b^2}\r)f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn
G^{e+b}_{22}(y^0)&=&-\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2}{1+b^2} \r) (1
+ \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) -{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}\left( \frac{1-b^2}{1+b^2}
\right) f(\gamma^{-1}y^0),\nn G^{e+b}_{ii}(y^0)&=&-{1 \over
\gamma\widetilde\gamma}f(\gamma^{-1}y^0) \qquad \quad
(i=3,\cdots,25),\nn
G^{e+b}_{01}(y^0)&=&+G^{e+b}_{10}(y^0)=\gamma\widetilde\gamma
eb\,(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)),\nn
G^{e+b}_{02}(y^0)&=&-G^{e+b}_{20}(y^0)=\gamma\widetilde\gamma
e\,(1+\cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)),\nn G^{e+b}_{12}(y^0)&=&-G^{e+b}_{21}(y^0)=
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2b}{1+b^2} \r) (1 + \cos(2\widetilde\lambda\pi)) +{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde\gamma} \l( \frac{2b}{1+b^2} \r) f(\gamma^{-1}y^0).
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T^{e+b}_{00}(y^0)&=&+{\cal T}_{25} \gamma\widetilde\gamma
(1+b^2) \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi),\nn
T^{e+b}_{11}(y^0)&=&+{\cal T}_{25}\l(
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2} \r)
\cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi)
-{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma} \l( \frac{1}{1+b^2} \r)
f(\gamma^{-1}y^0)\r),\nn
T^{e+b}_{22}(y^0)&=&-{\cal T}_{25}\l(
\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l( \frac{e^2}{1+b^2}\r)
\cos^2(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi)
+{1 \over \gamma \widetilde\gamma}\l( \frac{1}{1+b^2}\r)
f(\gamma^{-1}y^0) \r),\nn T^{e+b}_{ii}(y^0)&=&-{\cal T}_{25}{1 \over
\gamma\widetilde\gamma}f(\gamma^{-1}y^0), \qquad \qquad
(i=3,4,\dots,25),\nn
T^{e+b}_{01}(y^0)&=&T^{e+b}_{10}(y^0)={{\cal T}_{25}} \gamma\widetilde\gamma
eb\, \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi). \label{Teb}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\partial{\cal L}}{\partial b}=-{\cal T}_p\l( \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} \left(
\frac{e^2 b}{1+b^2}\right) V(T) {\cal D}(z) +{1 \over \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma}} \left(\frac{b}{1+b^2}\right) V(T){\cal F}(z)\r).
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta\sqrt{-\det(g+F)} &=&\sqrt{-\det(\eta+F)} \l({1 \over
\eta+F}\r)^{(ab)}\delta g_{ab}\nn &=&\gamma\widetilde\gamma \l(
{-(1+b^2)\delta g_{00} + be(\delta g_{01}+\delta g_{10})
+(1-e^2)\delta g_{11}+\delta g_{22} }\r) \nn
&+&\frac{1}{\gamma\widetilde\gamma} \sum_{i\ge3}\delta g_{ii}, \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta z&=&-\l(\frac{1}{\eta+F}\,\delta
g\,\frac{1}{\eta+F}\r)^{(ab)} \partial_a T\partial_b T\nn &=& -\gamma^4
\widetilde{\gamma}^4 \l[ {(1+b^2)\delta g_{00}-be(1+b^2)(\delta
g_{01}+\delta g_{10}) +b^2 e^2 \delta g_{11}-e^2 \delta g_{22}}\r]
\dot T^2. \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{00}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} (1+b^2) \,V(T){\cal D}(z),\nn
\frac{\delta{\cal L}}{\delta g_{11}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2}\l( +\gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} \frac{e^2b^2}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal D}(z) -{1 \over
\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}} \frac{1}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal F}(z)\r),\nn
\frac{\delta{\cal L}}{\delta g_{22}}&=&\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} \l( -\gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} \frac{e^2}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal D}(z) -{1 \over \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma}} \frac{1}{1+b^2}\,V(T){\cal F}(z)\r),\nn
\frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{ii}}&=&-\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2} {1 \over
\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}} \,V(T){\cal F}(z), \qquad \qquad (i = 3,
\cdots, p),\nn \frac{\delta {\cal L}}{\delta g_{01}}&=&\frac{\delta
{\cal L}}{\delta g_{10}} =-\frac{{\cal T}_p}{2}\gamma \widetilde{\gamma}
\,eb\,V(T){\cal D}(z). \nonumber
\
